Others: Quentin Grimes has stepped up in Luka Doncic's absence, averaging 15.6 points, 5.7 rebounds, and 4 assists in the seven games he has missed.
Grimes recorded team highs in points (23) and rebounds (nine) while dishing out six assists in a 118-97 victory over the Los Angeles Lakers on Tuesday.
Deni Avdija paced Portland with 26 points, while Shaedon Sharpe finished with 21 and Anfernee Simons 17 in their 119-100 win over the New Orleans Pelicans.
Robert Williams III made an impact with four points, six rebounds, and four blocks in 16 minutes of action against the New Orleans Pelicans.
This will be the fourth and final battle between the Mavericks and Trail Blazers this season.
